name: Kevin Levrone GOLD Blown Energizer,30 serv
description:
Kevin Levrone GOLD Blown Energizer,30 serv

Food supplement. With sweeteners. Contains caffeine (400 mg/serving size 9 g). Not recommended for children or pregnant women. The Full-Blown Energizer is a pre-workout product that contains a potent blend of active substances. Full Blown Energizer is recommended for physically active people, especially those who engage in high intensity and high volume strength training sessions.

Benefits

  • Kevin Levrone Full Blown Energizer is A pre-workout booster For Professional Athletes Who Train Intensively
  • Kevin Levrone Full Blown Energizer Increase Energy And Focus
  • Kevin Levrone Full Blown Energizer Improve Mental Alertness And Performance
  • Kevin Levrone Full Blown Energizer Contains Beta-Alanine, L-Citrulline Malate, Betaine Hydrochloride, Adenosine Triphosphate, Citicoline, L-Tyrosine

Ingredient

Beta-alanine, L-citrulline malate, betaine hydrochloride, adenosine triphosphate, citicoline, L-tyrosine, flavourings, acidity regulator (citric acid), anti-caking agents, caffeine, L-theanine, L-norvaline, niacin (nicotinamide), vitamin B6 (pyridoxine hydrochloride), colours, sweeteners (sucralose, acesulfame K). The measure included in the packet serves to facilitate portioning, but it does not guarantee precise dosing. It is advisable to use scales in order to measure out the exact amount.

Usage

Mix ~1 scoop of Full Blown Energizer (9 g) with 200-250 ml of cold water. Take 1 serving per day.
short_description:
Kevin Levrone GOLD Blown Energizer,30 serv

Key Features:

  • Kevin Levrone Full Blown Energizer is A pre-workout booster For Professional athletes Who Train Intensively
  • Kevin Levrone Full Blown Energizer Increase Energy And Focus
  • Kevin Levrone Full Blown Energizer Improve Mental Alertness And Performance

name: Kevin Levrone GOLD BCAA 2:1:1-30 servings
description:
Kevin Levrone GOLD BCAA 2:1:1-30 servings

GOLD BCAA 2:1:1. Food supplement. With sweeteners. A product that delivers branched-chain amino acids (BCAA) in 2:1:1 ratio, L-glutamine, citrulline malate, vitamins & electrolytes. The product is intended for people with increased physical activity.

Benefits

  • The high concentration of leucine has a positive effect on the functioning of the nervous system and reduces fatigue by increasing the ratio of bcaa to tryptophan
  • Facilitate quick muscle recovery after working out
  • Help build and protect the muscles from diminishment during weight loss
  • Ensures that your electrolytes are replaced as you sweat
  • Helps you maintain your edge through even the most intense workouts

Ingredients

BCAA complex (L-leucine, L-isoleucine, L-valine), L-glutamine, citrulline malate, vitamins and minerals premix [potassium citrate, magnesium citrate, sodium citrate, vitamin C (L-ascorbic acid), vitamin B6 (pyridoxine hydrochloride), vitamin B12 (cyanocobalamin)], flavourings, anti-caking agents, acidity regulators (malic acid, citric acid), colours, sweeteners (steviol glycosides, sucralose, acesulfame K). The measure included in the packet serves to facilitate portioning, but it does not guarantee precise dosing. It is advisable to use scales in order to measure out the exact amount.
short_description:
Kevin Levrone GOLD BCAA 2:1:1-30 servings

Key Features:

  • Facilitate quick muscle recovery after working out
  • Help build and protect the muscles from diminishment during weight loss
  • Ensures that your electrolytes are replaced as you sweat
  • Helps you maintain your edge through even the most intense workouts

name: GAT Sport Flexx EAAs+ Hydration
description:
GAT Sport Flexx EAAs+ Hydration

Product description

FLEXX EAAs delivers all 9 Essential Amino Acids (EAAs) for complete muscle protein synthesis. The result: Muscle preservation, energy, enhanced endurance, and recovery. This total amino acid profile features 7g of EAAs, with 5g in the clinically preferred 2:1:1 ratio. For stress mitigation and improved vitality, it includes 125mg of the adaptogenic herb Sensoril Ashwagandha. Our amazing flavors provide hydration support that’s truly delicious, anytime: Pre, Intra, and Post-Workout. For the hard training athlete, FLEXX EAAs is the complete muscle and recovery solution.
short_description:
GAT Sport Flexx EAAs+ Hydration

  • Essential Aminos – Each serving of Flexx EAAs contains 7g of Essential Amino Acids to help promote muscle protein synthesis
  • Adaptogen Driven Vitality Support – Flexx EAAs provides 125mg of Ashwagandha to help promote better Cortisol support
  • Enhanced Recovery – In addition to EAAs, each serving is packed with 5g of Branched Chain Amino Acids to support better recovery
  • Balanced Hydration – Coconut water provides a balanced mixture of minerals and electrolytes to support optimal hydration levels
  • Endurance Fuel – Flexx EAAs are perfect for any activity from weight lifting to hiking, bicycling and anything in between

name: GAT JETMASS 720GM
description:
GAT JETMASS, Creatine (720 g)

Key Factors

  • 5 g Creatine Monohydrate
  • 1 g Glutamine
  • 1 g BCAAs
  • 1 g Waxy Maize

Improved Formula - Build Muscle Size & Strength Faster

JetMass provides a superior Creatine driven formulation for athletes with goals for exercise-induced gains in muscle, strength and performance specifically formulated to increase uptake of Creatine, add lean muscle mass, increase muscle torque and speed recovery times. JetMass now contains 5 grams of pharmacological grade Creapure Creatine monohydrate, the recommended daily level supported by research. No form of Creatine delivers creatine uptake into muscles better than Creatine Monohydrate.

JetMass Formula Advantages:

  • 5 grams Creapure Creatine Monohydrate, a source of pure Creatine manufactured in Germany.
  • Contains 13 grams of Carbohydrate, Waxy Maize, Maltodextrin, and Dextrose to promote creatine uptake by spiking insulin.†
  • Contains Phosphates to buffer the build up of lactic acid from strenuous training.
  • Contains 2 grams of Glutamine plus BCAAs to support muscle anabolism and recovery.
short_description:

name: Sunline Alaska L-Arginine 90 Caps
description:
Sunline Alaska L-Arginine 1000 mg, 90 Capsules

  • Non-GMO
  • GMP Certified
  • Contionally Essential Amino Acid
  • Nitric Oxide Precursor*

Product description

L-Arginine is a conditionally essential basic amino acid involved primarily in urea metabolism and excretion, as well as in DNA synthesis and protein production.* It is an important precursor of Nitric Oxide (NO) and thus plays a role in the dilation of blood vessels.* The L-Arginine used in this product is Pharmaceutical Grade.
short_description:
Sunline Alaska L-Arginine 1000 mg, 90 Capsules

Product description

L-Arginine is a conditionally essential basic amino acid involved primarily in urea metabolism and excretion, as well as in DNA synthesis and protein production.* It is an important precursor of Nitric Oxide (NO) and thus plays a role in the dilation of blood vessels.* The L-Arginine used in this product is Pharmaceutical Grade.

name: Sunline Alaska Creatine Monohydrate 300 gms
description:
Sunline Alaska Creatine Monohydrate 300 gms

  • Natural color variation may occur in this product.
  • Store in a cool, dry, dark place after opening.
  • Caution: For adults only. Consult physician if pregnant/nursing, taking medication, or have a medical condition (especially kidney condition). Keep out of reach of children.
  • Creatine Monohydrate5 g (5,000 mg)
short_description:
Sunline Alaska Creatine Monohydrate 300 gms

Product description

Creatine is a compound that occurs naturally in the body, primarily in skeletal muscle. Creatine’s function is to serve as a precursor to adenosine triphosphate (ATP), the form of chemical energy used by all cells.* Body stores of creatine create a pool of readily available ATP for energy, which is necessary for fueling quick bursts of power and strength.* Studies have demonstrated that creatine supplementation can help to maintain existing muscle tissue, support the growth and development of lean mass, and promote optimal performance during short bouts of intense exercise.* Sunline Creatine Monohydrate has no additives or preservatives.

Directions:

As a dietary supplement, mix each level scoop in 10-14 fl. oz. of water (adjust for taste preference) and shake well. On training days, consume 1 level scoop during exercise and 1 level scoop after exercise. On non-training days, consume 2 level scoops throughout the day. For best results, consume daily
